def get_job_run(self, name, run_id): """ Gets information about a single job run.
:param name: The name of the job definition for the run. :param run_id: The ID of the run. :return: Information about the run. """ try: response = self.glue_client.get_job_run(JobName=name, RunId=run_id) except ClientError as err: logger.error( "Couldn't get job run %s/%s. Here's why: %s: %s", name, run_id, err.response['Error']['Code'], err.response['Error']['Message']) raise else: return response['JobRun']
